wcGeneSummary 0.99.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    wcGeneSummary

    plotDynamic

    plotDynamic.Rd

    list network of words using graphlayouts::layout_as_dynamic

    Usage

    plotDynamic(
  listOfNets,
  concat = "union",
  alpha = 0.5,
  titles = NULL,
  tag = FALSE
)

    Arguments

    listOfNets

    list consisting results of wc* functions (plotType="network")

    concat

    "union" or "intersection"

    alpha

    pass to layout_as_dynamic

    titles

    title to be shown on plot

    tag

    show tag on plot

    Value

    plot comparing gene clusters

    Examples

    library(igraph)
wc1 <- wcGeneSummary(c("DDX41","IRF3"), plotType="network")
#> input genes: 2
#> 'select()' returned 1:1 mapping between keys and columns
#> converted input genes: 2
#> filtered 61 words (frequency | tfidf) ...
#> Warning: the standard deviation is zero
wc2 <- wcGeneSummary(c("DDX41","PNKP"), plotType="network")
#> input genes: 2
#> 'select()' returned 1:1 mapping between keys and columns
#> converted input genes: 2
#> filtered 61 words (frequency | tfidf) ...
#> Warning: the standard deviation is zero
compare <- plotDynamic(list(wc1, wc2))
